Package com.vangav.backend.play_framework.controllers_generator

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ControllersGeneratorConstantsInl
    ControllersGeneratorConstantsInls contains constants shared by all generators
    ControllersGeneratorInl
    ControllersGeneratorInl generate JAVA controllers' classes for a backend It generats CommonHandler.java and request_properties.prop for all controllers And for each controller it generates: 1) Controller.java: represents the controller's entry point 2) Handler.java: handles request-to-response processing 3) Request.java: represents the controller's request 4) Response.java: represents the controller's response note: I don't like the design of this class, while working on it I don't have the capacity to come up with a better design that's would ideally be more generic But it works and saves hours (or months on scale) of work as the Backend grows while keeping things consistent and error-free A different technique is used for Vangav M code generation but it may be tricky to maintain for others! that's why the current technique is used instead.
    ControllersParserInl
    ControllersParserInl has inline static methods for parsing controllers config [controllers.json]
    ControllersVerifierInl
    ControllersVerifierInl has inline static methods for verifying controllers config [controllers.json]
